titleStmt.title: The chast and lost lovers living shadowed in the person of Arcadius and Sepha and illustrated with the several stories of Haemon and Antigone, Eramio and Amissa, Phaon and Sappho, Delithason and Verista ... : to which is added the contestation betwixt Bacchus and Diana, and certain sonnets of the author to Aurora / digested into three poems by Will. Bosworth.
titleStmt.author: Bosworth, William, 1607-1650?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
